rules_text:
[i]({T}: Add {R}.)[/i]
[i][i]Wanderlust[/i][/i] – Otherworldly Mountain enters tapped unless you control four or more other differently named lands.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: [i]I saw below me, that golden valley...[/i]
notes: This Land is Your Land by Woody Guthrie
